subject: Leadership
title: Agile Strategy
description: Learn Agile Strategy in one minute.

hook.text: A three-year strategic plan is outdated by month six. The market shifted, a competitor pivoted, and new tech emerged.

buildup.text: Agile strategy replaces rigid long-term plans with short cycles of experimentation, learning, and adaptation.

discovery.text: The core principle: plan just enough to act, act quickly, learn from results, and adjust. Speed of learning wins.

twist.text: Agile doesn't mean no strategy. It means holding direction firmly while holding plans loosely. Adapt the path, not aim.

climax.text: Leaders build agile strategy with quarterly planning cycles, rapid experiments, and decision reviews every 90 days.

punchline.text: Plans are guesses. Learning is strategy.

quiz.question: What is agile strategy?
options: Short cycles of action, learning, and adaptation
